name: Peacock by LCL
description:
Controls: 

Z/Space: Interact, Accept, Select, Talk

X: Decline, Open Menu, Back 

Shift: Move Fast

A stupid RPG about memes and stuff. You play as a duo of unlikely heroes, known as Pea, and Cock. Who are a pea, and rooster respectively. 

Peacock 2: The Squeacock: Coming October 10th, 2017.
